system.description:
Your practice and study has unlocked new synergies between physical and mental ability, granting the following benefits:

  • Your Exertion Pool increases by an amount equal to your intelligence modifier.  Any time you would need to expend a hit die to activate a Scholar ability, you may spend 2 exertion instead.  In addition, when you spend a minute to expend a hit die to regain exertion, you can increase the amount regained by your intelligence modifier.  
  • You also gain your choice of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.v4pkjilh484jph6i]{Precision Strikes} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.okthtwyohmh0eoa5]{Mystic Apprentice} scholar abilities.  If you choose Mystic Apprentice, you also gain your choice of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.ljixftygfhi0sfsf]{Guidance}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.ser51pqchqdb1zqu]{Circular Breathing}, or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.u0ez2czg763i77kl]{Calculate} as an additional cantrip known, on top of those normally gained by the ability.  If you choose Precision Strikes, then 1/2 adept levels count as scholar levels to determine bonus damage. You may activate it as part of the same bonus action used for @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.0ga9dnbgpq466btw]{Flurry of Blows} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.toaxt1l34b9u4a8y]{Patient Defense}, and if you have Mystic Apprentice you can activate Flurry of Blows after using an action to attack with a cantrip.
